info.title: Enrichment API
info.description: The Enrichment API provides a single API to lookup person and company data. The API is designed to be simple and easy to use.

get.summary: Combined lookup for person and company based on an email address

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to look up.

parameters.name: webhook_url
parameters.description: A webhook URL that results will be sent to.

parameters.name: given_name
parameters.description: The person's first name.

parameters.name: family_name
parameters.description: The person's last name. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.description: The person's IP address. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The city or country where the person lives.

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: The name of the company the person works for.

parameters.name: company_domain
parameters.description: The domain of the company the person works for.

parameters.name: linkedin
parameters.description: The person's LinkedIn profile URL.

parameters.name: twitter
parameters.description: The person's Twitter profile username.

parameters.name: facebook
parameters.description: The person's Facebook profile URL.

parameters.name: webhook_id
parameters.description: Custom identifier for the webhook request.

parameters.name: subscribe
parameters.description: Set to true to subscribe to the changes to the person.

parameters.name: suppression
parameters.description: Set to eu to exclude person records with country data in the EU. Set to eu_strict to exclude person records with country data in the EU or with null country data.

200.description: Successful lookup, person & company encoded in the response body.

202.description: Asynchronously looking up the person & company.

404.description: Neither the Person or the Company were found.

get.summary: Find person by email and company

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the person to find.

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: The company name of the person to find.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain to look up.

parameters.name: webhook_url
parameters.description: A webhook URL that results will be sent to.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: The company's name.

parameters.name: linkedin
parameters.description: The company's LinkedIn page URL.

parameters.name: twitter
parameters.description: The company's Twitter profile username.

parameters.name: facebook
parameters.description: The company's Facebook page URL.

parameters.name: webhook_id
parameters.description: Custom identifier for the webhook request.

200.description: Successful lookup, company encoded in the response body.

id.description: Clearbit’s internal identifier for the person.

fullName.description: The person’s full name. This may exist even if the givenName or familyName aren’t available.

location.description: The city, state, and country where the person lives.

timeZone.description: The person’s time zone based on their location. See all possible values.

utcOffset.description: The difference in hours from the person’s time zone to UTC (-12 to 14).

city.description: The city the person lives in based on their location.

state.description: The state the person lives in based on their location.

stateCode.description: The state code of the state the person lives in based on their location.

country.description: The country the person lives in based on their location.

countryCode.description: The country code of the country the person lives in based on their location.

lat.description: The latitude based on the person’s location.

lng.description: The longitude based on the person’s location.

bio.description: The person’s bio surfaced through their own social media accounts.

site.description: The person’s website surfaced through their own social media accounts.

avatar.description: The person’s profile picture surfaced through their own social media accounts.

domain.description: The domain of the company the person works for.

name.description: The name of the company the person works for.

title.description: The person’s title at the company they work for.

role.description: The person’s standardized role at the company they work for based on their title. See all possible values.

subRole.description: The person’s standardized sub role at the company they work for based on their title. See all possible values.

seniority.description: The person’s standardized seniority at the company they work for based on their title. See all possible values.

handle.description: The person’s Facebook profile username (e.g. amaccaw).
The person’s GitHub profile username (e.g. maccman).

id.description: The ID of the person’s GitHub profile.

avatar.description: The profile picture of the person’s GitHub profile.

company.description: The company the person works for as listed on their GitHub profile.

blog.description: The person’s website as listed on their GitHub profile.

followers.description: The number of followers the person has on GitHub.

following.description: The number of people the person follows on GitHub.

handle.description: The person’s Twitter profile username (e.g. maccaw).

id.description: The ID of the person’s Twitter profile.

bio.description: The person’s bio as listed on their Twitter profile.

followers.description: The number of followers the person has on Twitter.

following.description: The number of people the person follows on Twitter.

statuses.description: The number of tweets the person has shared on Twitter.

favorites.description: The number of tweets the person has liked on Twitter.

location.description: The person’s location as listed on their Twitter profile.

site.description: The person’s website as listed on their Twitter profile.

avatar.description: The profile picture of the person’s Twitter profile.

handle.description: The last section of the person’s LinkedIn profile URL (e.g. in/alex-maccaw-ab592978).
The person’s Google Plus username. This field has been deprecated.
The person’s Gravatar profile username (e.g. maccman).

urls.description: A list of websites listed by the person

avatar.description: The profile picture of the person’s Gravatar profile.

avatars.description: A list of pictures listed by the person on their Gravatar profile.

fuzzy.description: Indicates whether the person’s search was fuzzy or an exact match.

emailProvider.description: Indicates whether the person’s email domain is associated with a free email provider (e.g. Gmail). Useful for distinguishing between personal emails and work emails.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the person’s record was last updated in Clearbit’s database. A record update may or may not include new information about the person.

activeAt.description: Timestamp indicating when Clearbit detected the person’s email became active.

inactiveAt.description: Timestamp indicating when Clearbit detected the person’s email became inactive.

id.description: Clearbit’s internal identifier for the company.

domainAliases.description: A list of domains that redirect to the company’s main website.

phoneNumbers.description: A list of phone numbers listed on the company’s website.

emailAddresses.description: A list of email addresses listed on the company’s website.

sector.description: The broadest tier of company industry classification. See all possible values.

industryGroup.description: The second tier of company industry classification. See all possible values.

industry.description: The third tier of company industry classification. See all possible values.

subIndustry.description: The most specific tier of company industry classification. See all possible values.

sicCode.description: The two digit company Standard Industry Classification (SIC) code. See all possible values.

naicsCode.description: The two digit company North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code. See all possible values.

tags.description: A list of company vertical descriptors. Typically more granular than industry classification. See all possible values.

foundedYear.description: The year the company was founded.

timeZone.description: The company’s time zone based on their location. See all possible values.

utcOffset.description: The difference in hours from the company’s time zone to UTC (-12 to 14).

streetNumber.description: The street number of the company headquarters based on their location.

streetName.description: The street name of the company headquarters based on their location.

subPremise.description: The suite number of the company headquarters based on their location.

streetAddress.description: The street address of the company headquarters based on their location.

city.description: The city of the company headquarters based on their location.

postalCode.description: The postal code of the company headquarters based on their location.

state.description: The state of the company headquarters based on their location.

stateCode.description: The state code of the company headquarters based on their location.

country.description: The country of the company headquarters based on their location.
